channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The 2025 Ford Maverick Shows That Hybrid Pickup Trucks Are Going Mainstream
item.description: Just as Tesla ditches its $60,000 Cybertruck, Ford finally allows buyers to pair its efficient hybrid powertrain with all-wheel drive and a towing package. Hallelujah.

item.title: Kiteworks captures $456M at a $1B+ valuation to help secure sensitive data
item.description: Mark up another unicorn and large funding round for the cybersecurity industry: Kiteworks, a company that builds tools to secure email communications, file sharing, and other situations where people are working with sensitive or proprietary data outside their firewalls, has raised $456 million from Insight Partners and Sixth Street Growth. The investment values the company […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: HMD Skyline Review: The First Qi2 Android Smartphone
item.description: I tried the world’s first Qi2 Android smartphone, which adds a MagSafe-like charging experience.

item.title: Apple finally allows Spotify to show pricing info to EU users on iOS
item.description: Spotify will be able to display the pricing for things like Spotify subscriptions and digital goods, including Spotify's more recently added collection of audiobooks. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Best Student Discounts (2024): Laptops, Streaming Services, Tech, and Software
item.description: That .edu email is your ticket to exclusive savings on laptops, streaming services, software, and more.

item.title: The defense tech acquisition spree has begun: Autonomous factory startup Hadrian acquires Datum Source
item.description: Hadrian announced they bought Datum Source, a software company founded by SpaceX alums that uses AI to help hardware companies find manufacturing partners. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: The English Premier League Will Ditch Its Hated VAR Offside Tech for a Fleet of iPhones
item.description: Later this season, the UK’s top soccer division will replace its controversial VAR offside-detection system in favor of a phalanx of Apple’s smartphones.

item.title: India’s top court clears way for Byju’s insolvency proceedings
item.description: India's Supreme Court has cleared the way for insolvency proceedings to be resumed against Byju's in a win for U.S. creditors. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: ChatGPT Advanced Voice Mode First Impressions: Fun, and Just a Bit Creepy
item.description: The new voice feature from OpenAI for ChatGPT is often entertaining and will even do a Trump impression. It likely rolls out to all paid users this fall.

item.title: xAI releases Grok-2, adds image generation on X
item.description: Elon Musk-owned launched Grok-2 and Grok-2 mini in beta today with improved reasoning. The new Grok AI model can now generate images on the X social network, though Grok access is currently limited to Premium and Premium+ users on X. xAI said that both Grok-2 and Grok-2 mini are available to users on X in […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.
